title: Womens Dress
title_original: Softies Marshmallow Slouch Socks for Women Ultra Soft Plush Lounge Socks with Non Slip Grippers One Size Cozy Comfort

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #17,958 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #175 in Women's Slipper Socks

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Socks & Hosiery > Slipper Socks

reviews.customers_say: Customers find these socks soft, comfortable, and well-fitting, with one customer noting they come up over the calves. They receive positive feedback for their quality, warmth, and appearance, with one customer describing them as a "little slice of luxury." They appreciate the slip resistance, with one mentioning the grippy bottom. While some customers consider them worth the money, others find them pricey.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect lounge sock
items.body: 10/10. perfect non skid sock. soft and cozy, love the tall length. love that the bottoms are grippy Read more
items.author: Nicole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these!
items.body: Ok I bought these just to go under a walking boot after surgery. I ended up buying more pairs. They are so soft and warm. The best part is they stay up and don't slide down if you don't want to scrunch them. I want them in every color! A little bit pricey for a single pair of socks but I think they're worth it! Read more
items.author: Boymom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A most buy!
items.body: My new favorite socks. So soft and cozy. Read more
items.author: Sara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: The socks exceeded my expectations. Very soft and I loved the colors that I purchased which were the light pink and light grey. Read more
items.author: Nina Pellegrino

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and comfortable, but the color is off.
items.body: Very cute but way more of a cool tone gray than a light Heather gray. Read more
items.author: Jessica Lynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Female Coworkers LOVE THEM
items.body: I bought for all the ladies I work with and they LOVE. The non slip bottom is amazing they say and they’re so warm and fluffy and cozy. All shared by ladies who love them. The slouchy fit make them feel like marshmallows. Read more
items.author: Danley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must get
items.body: Absolutely would recommend. The are so comfy and with the little non-slide pads in the bottom, I can run after me 8 month old mini schnauzer on hardwood floors. And for the price. They are worth it. Any thicker and it would be uncomfortable. And of course they look good with leggings. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice socks
items.body: I like the socks but they are really long, even when slouch them. They are comfortable but no more soft than many socks I’ve purchased at a much lower price. I was expecting something that would. justify the cost for softness. Kind of disappointed. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Heather Coco, Light Heather Cherry Cola, Dark Heather Cherry Cola, Light Heather Espresso, Driftwood, Heather Black, Dark Heather Espresso, Heather Blush Pink, Heather Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
